name: Omega Clash
description:
How to Play

  • Left / Right: left / right arrows (or a / d keys)
  • Shoot: Ctrl key (or "j")
  • Pause/Unpause game: "p"

What is "Omega Clash"?

Omega Clash is a very simple space shooter, designed to look like our old favorites from early 80's.

Annnnd... it's still a prototype, so if you have any suggestions to make, please contact me. I'll be very happy to answer your questions!

Why should I play this crap?

Answer honestly:

  • Have you spent lots of jolly hours on your childhood playing games on Atari 2600, Intellivision and ColecoVision?
  • Do you miss those days, when games were simpler but really fun?
  • Do you think modern game graphics are amazing, but most of the fun is lost?
  • Do you ever play your old favorites on emulators, longing for that happy days?
  • If you answered "yes" to that simple questions , perhaps Omega Clash can be a game for you to play.

Features

  • Web based game made with HTML5 technology
  • Cool retro graphics
  • Lots of baddies
  • Easy to play, tough to win

To be made

  • Android / iOS version
